title: The Cow and the sprite
brief_description: One of a series of films which puppets are used to interpret folk legends. The film is an adaptation of an old Scotch-Irish folk story that tells of the happiness of man and of what it is composed.
description: One of a series of films which puppets are used to interpret folk legends. The film is an adaptation of an old Scotch-Irish folk story that tells of the happiness of man and of what it is composed.
